description: Erection of first floor rear extension and rear dormer roof extension and installation of 2 no. rooflights to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The flat roof area(s) of the ground floor extension shall not be used as a roof garden, balcony, seating area or other similar amenity area, and shall not be accessed except for the purpose of maintenance or in the case of emergency.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Officers have assessed the submitted details for the discharge of Condition 16 (Boundary Treatment) of planning permission 22/01104/FUL, however, insufficient information in the form of dimensions/scaled drawings has been submitted to fully detail what is proposed and to demonstrate that the boundary treatment would be of an acceptable character and appearance. The applicant is advised to provide elevations demonstrating the specification, such as colour of the boundary treatment, height etc. Additionally, the submitted document demonstrating the brickwork does not show the colour specification.
Application Form Declaration - this must be signed by the Agent of Applicant, but has been signed in the name of a third party. Please check the Declaration signature and amend where necessary.
